sn2.20:1.1: Ekamantam thito kho anathapindiko devaputto bhagavato santike ima gathayo abhasi:
sn2.20:6.2: Idam vatva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
sn2.20:7.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
sn2.20:7.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim annataro devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
sn2.20:7.3: Ekamantam thito kho, bhikkhave, so devaputto mama santike ima gathayo abhasi:
sn2.20:12.2: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
sn2.20:13.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn2.20:13.2: “so hi nuna, bhante, anathapindiko devaputto bhavissati.
sn2.20:13.3: Anathapindiko gahapati ayasmante sariputte abhippasanno ahosi”ti.
sn2.20:13.4: “Sadhu sadhu, ananda, yavatakam kho, ananda, takkaya pattabbam anuppattam tam taya.
